title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST-style API and ready-to-pull quantized models (Llama 2, Mistral, CodeLlama, …).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, RAG, admin panel, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI tool that wraps Ollama with interactive chat, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate/chat/embed with blocks or streaming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) with one-liner docker run examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI services, Next.js chat, LangChain agents, GPU tuning, etc.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot template that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module with decorators and dependency injection for Ollama services.
